definition: easy and not involved or complicated, a person lacking intelligence or common sense
details:
adjective
- easy and not involved or complicated
= synonyms: elementary
- unornamented
= example: unornamented
- lacking mental capacity and subtlety
= synonyms: dim-witted
- (botany) of leaf shapes
= synonyms: unsubdivided
- having few parts
- exhibiting childlike simplicity and credulity
= synonyms: round-eyed, wide-eyed, childlike, dewy-eyed
- apart from anything else
= synonyms: bare
noun
- a person lacking intelligence or common sense
= synonyms: simpleton
- any herbaceous plant having medicinal properties
